subject: New Test---Morse Code
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I'm going to have to run this one past my father, being he is a Ham 
Operator (KA2RHU) in NJ for anyone who wants to know.  I took 5 files 
and played them in a sequence and recorded it, it consists of tone 
frequencies ranging from 100hz, 250hz, 440hz, 1khz and 10khz.  They 
were 5 second clips of each and than i ran it through EvpMaker and it 
sounds like morse code, but i have to brush up on it to see if it makes 
any sense.  Is it possible for them to communicate through morse code?  
I've attached a 30 second clip of the example running it through 
EvpMaker.  I'll also attach my original tone file i created.
 
-Steve H.
